en.sc1: Inserting an element at the head of an array-based list requires shifting all existing elements in the array by one position toward the tail.
en.sc2: Here is an array-based list with five elements. We will insert an element with value 23 to position 0.
en.sc3: Shift all existing elements one position to the right to make room.
en.sc6: Thus, the cost to insert into an array-based list in the worst case is $\Theta(n)$ when there are $n$ items in the list.
